sentences.en: But we, the year of the meal to hotpot.
sentences.cn: 而我们家, 今年的年夜饭改成吃火锅.

sentences.en: Donglaishun's Mutton Hotpot astanding history and is loved by many for its special taste.
sentences.cn: 东来顺的“涮羊肉”历史悠久,''.'风味'.''''.'独特'. '',深受群众喜爱.

sentences.en: Fine, I know a good hotpot place in the downtown area, food there is pretty spicy too.
sentences.cn: 好，我知道商业区有一个吃火锅的好地方，那里的食物也很辣。

sentences.en: First go and sweep up the snow . For lunch , I'll treat you to a meat hotpot. "
sentences.cn: 先去扫扫雪, 晌午我请你吃火锅. ”

sentences.en: Lancashire hotpot is a dish consisting essentially of meat, onion and potatoes left to bake in the oven all day in a heavy pot and on a low heat.
sentences.cn: 兰开夏火锅主要有肉、洋葱、土豆组成，这些食材要在一个非常重的锅里面低火烹制一天方可食用。

sentences.en: Lancashire hotpot is a well known stew.
sentences.cn: 兰开夏郡火锅也是有名的菜肴.

sentences.en: Lancashire hotpot: This is another British dish that uses lamb, named after the Lancashire region in the middle of the UK.
sentences.cn: 兰克希儿郡火锅 ：这又是一道用羊羔肉做的英式菜肴，以英国中部的兰克希儿地区命名。

sentences.en: Not exactly how my mother would cook her Lancashire hotpot, but good enough for me.
sentences.cn: 并非完全和我妈做兰开夏炖肉的方法一样, 但对我来说已经够好了.

sentences.en: Our country population is numerous, hotpot average per capita has an amount under world average level.
sentences.cn: 我国人口众多, 羊肉人均占有量低于世界平均水平.

sentences.en: People in Haikou often go to the Volcano Park to eat lamb hotpot.
sentences.cn: 海口人常常往火山口公园吃乳羊火锅.

sentences.en: So you don't like our hotpot?
sentences.cn: 那么你不喜欢吃火锅喽?

sentences.en: They should go to 78 everyday, even ten, eat dough cake, catch meal, bun, hotpot.
sentences.cn: 他们天天都要去七八家, 甚至十几家, 吃油饼 、 抓饭 、 包子 、 羊肉.

sentences.en: When eating hotpot , mung bean sprouts can be instant boiled in the dish.
sentences.cn: 南豆腐鸡蛋汤是很好吃的一道菜.

words.tran_cn: 牛肉，羊肉，马铃薯合敦的菜肴
